Detailed Description

A button with two states, checked and unchecked.

When the button is pressed or clicked, the state changes automatically.

The following example demonstrates how to use the CompoundButton

 //We can't initialize CompoundButton object.
 //But we can initialize its subclasses (ex:CheckBox) to use its APIs.
 gaia::ui::CheckBox* mpCheckBox = new gaia::ui::CheckBox(static_cast<Page*>(this));

 //use CompoundButton's API
 bool orChecked = mpCheckBox->isChecked();

Definition at line 44 of file CompoundButton.h.
